mapper.select: SELECT member_seq , member_name FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE member_approval_yn = 'Y' AND member_auth_cd IN ('master', 'level1') ORDER BY member_name DESC

SELECT tcg.group_seq , tcg.group_name FROM TB_CHILDREN tc, TB_CHD_GROUP tcg WHERE tc.children_group_cd = tcg.group_seq AND tc.children_active_yn = 'Y' AND tc.children_position_cd = #{groupPosiotionCd } GROUP BY tcg.group_seq

SELECT tm.member_id , tm.member_pw , tm.member_name , tm.member_email , tm.member_cp , tm.member_auth_cd , IFNULL(tc.center_name, '없음') AS member_position , date_format(tm.member_reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') AS member_reg_dt FROM TB_MEMBER tm LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CENTER tc ON tm.member_position_cd = tc.center_seq WHERE member_seq = #{memberSeq }
SELECT member_seq , center_seq FROM TB_ACCESS_RECORD WHERE member_seq = #{memberSeq }
